sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO BBS (BBS_SEQ, BBS_INFO_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENTS, REG_EMAIL, REG_IP, UPD_EMAIL, UPD_IP, MEMBERS_SEQ) VALUES (BBS_SEQ.NEXTVAL, '1', #bbs_title#, #bbs_contents#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#, #reg_email#, #reg_ip#, (SELECT MEMBERS_SEQ FROM MEMBERS WHERE EMAIL=#reg_email# AND ADMIN_YN='Y'))
sqlMap.select: SELECT BBS_SEQ, BBS_TITLE, REG_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY.MM.DD') REG_DATE, BBS_HITCOUNT FROM BBS WHERE BBS_INFO_SEQ = '1' ORDER BY BBS_SEQ DESC
SELECT BBS_TITLE, BBS_CONTENTS, BBS_HITCOUNT, REG_EMAIL, TO_CHAR(REG_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD HH:MI') REG_DATE FROM BBS WHERE BBS_INFO_SEQ='1' AND BBS_SEQ=#bbs_seq#
